alert.note: Alert for Northern Westchester; Orange; Putnam (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 1:46AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Westchester, east central Orange and Putnam Counties through 230 AM EDT... At 146 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Cold Spring, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Peekskill, Mahopac, Lake Carmel, West Point, Brewster, Cold Spring, Carmel, Fahnestock State Park, Jefferson Valley, Putnam Valley, Firthcliffe, Highland Falls, Vails Gate, Cornwall On Hudson and Fort Montgomery. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
